DOC.brief_summary: Evidence support use bioabsorbable polymer drug elute stent ( BP-DES ) uncertain . Thus investigator plan meta-analysis compare outcomes BP-DES versus PP-DES obstructive coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Bioabsorbable Versus Durable Polymer Drug Eluting Stent ( DES ) : Meta-analysis
DOC.detailed_description: Evidence support use bioabsorbable polymer drug elute stent ( BP-DES ) uncertain . Previous study suggest BP-DES least effective durable polymer drug elute stent ( PP-DES ) . Thus investigator plan meta-analysis compare outcomes BP-DES versus PP-DES obstructive coronary artery disease . Medline Web databases searched study compare BP-DES PP-DES obstructive coronary disease , report rate overall mortality , target lesion revascularization ( TLR ) , myocardial infarction ( MI ) , binary restenosis late lumen loss ( LLL ) follow-up â‰¥ 6 month . Odds ratio ( ORs ) compute individual study pool accord fix effect ( e.g . inverse variance weight ) random effect model case statistical heterogeneity . Given priori heterogeneous nature observational analysis , separate subgroup analysis study PLA bioabsorbable polymer load biolimus A19 ( BP-BES ) prespecified .
DOC.criteria: randomize study study report clinical outcome overall death and/or acute myocardial infarction and/or late stent thrombosis ( ARC definition ) [ ** ] and/or target lesion revascularization and/or late lumen loss follow period longer 6 month . duplicate reporting ( case manuscript report large sample long followup select ) inability compute risk estimate due absence clinical event one group study present composite major adverse cardiac event ( MACE ) individual end point .
